name: Masters of the Danat
description:
A long time ago the Great Shwarz and a few other Masters of the Danat defeated nefarious Netch and his army of miners. After that Danatia lived in peace once again and Shwarz began a journey in search of power and knowledge. Many years later the Great Shwarz returned to Danatia, feeling disturbance in Danat Energy, but during his absence a lot has changed. Once militant nation now invests all its' time in science and art and the Black Danat Corps keeps order. Does the gut feeling of the Old Master lie to him or is everything really not that simple around here?

Features
• Classic Run'n'Gun with puzzle and platforming elements.
• Every level is unique in its' gameplay (like in Battletoads)
• Weapon upgrades
• Breathtaking story (well, you know, like in Battletoads)
• Soundtrack that will be definitely stuck in your brain for quite some time

Actually at first Masters of the Danat was just a tool for me to study Game Maker engine. But the more I spent time on it the more I wanted to make it a real game.

*Masters of the Danat is a fangame.  All rights belong to their respective owners.*
